post.summary:
Connect: create or find a Fabric connection.  
Returns the corresponding connection ID.

Execute: execute a transaction on a Fabric endpoint.  
Returns the result of the transaction.

channel_id.description: Name of the Fabric channel to connect to. Default is pre-configured by gateway service.

user_name.description: Name of Fabric client user for establishing the connection. Default is pre-configured by gateway service.

org_name.description: Name of the Fabric org that created the client user. Default is pre-configured by gateway service.

network_config.description: File name for Fabric network config. Default is pre-configured by gateway service.

patten_matchers.description: File name for endpoint patten matchers. Default is pre-configured by gateway service.

v1ConnectionData.title: Request data for creating a Fabric connection in the gateway service

message.title: Error messages if code is not 200

connection_id.title: ID of the resulting Fabric connection

v1ConnectionResponse.title: Response from a Fabric connection request

connection_id.title: Required. ID of a Fabric connection returned by a ConnectRequest

chaincode_id.description: Required. Name of the Fabric chaincode to be called.

timeout.description: Request timeout in milliseconds. Default is 0, i.e., no timeout.

endpoint.description: Fabric connnection endpoints to send the request. Default is randomly chosen from all available endpoints.

transaction.description: Required. Name of the Fabric chaincode transaction.

transient_map.description: transient map for the transaction as a JSON string.

v1TransactionData.title: Request data for a Fabric chaincode transaction

message.title: Error messages if code is not 200

v1TransactionType.description: Type of Fabric transaction: INVOKE or QUERY.
